text: nim'modeyanu ‘malak’galodane ‘‘nanu bhumiyalli obba pratinidhiyannu nemisaliddene’’ endaga avaru ‘‘alli asantiyannu habbuva mattu rakta harisuvavanannu ninu nemisuveya? Navantu, ninnannu prasansisutta ninna pavitravannu japisutta ninna pavitravannu kondadutta irutteve’’ endaru. Avanu (allahanu), ‘‘khanditavagiyu nimage tiliyade iruvudu nanage tilidide’’ endanu
